name: ice-heal
effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Cures freezing.

flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A spray-type medicine.
It defrosts a frozen POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
A spray-type medicine.
It defrosts a Pokémon that has been
frozen solid.

A spray-type medicine.
It defrosts a Pokémon that has been
frozen solid.

A spray-type medicine.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A spray-type medicine for freezing.
It can be used once to defrost a
Pokémon that has been frozen solid.

A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used
once to defrost a Pokémon that has been
frozen solid.

A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A spray-type medicine for treating freezing. It can be
used to thaw out a single Pokémon that has been
frozen solid.

A spray-type medicine for treating freezing. It can be
